name: HaikuReader
0:
”Alexa, open Haiku Reader”
”Alexa, tell Haiku reader to recite a haiku”
”Alexa, open Haiku Reader and tell me a poem”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: haiku reader
des:
This is a simple skill used to entertain the user by reciting short haiku poems. 

- Haiku reader can recite a random poem from its repertoire
- Haiku reader can find and recite a poem based on a keyword or topic

sample utterances: 

"Alexa, ask Haiku reader to read a poem." 
"Alex, ask Haiku reader to say something funny."
